# streamkap_topics (Data Source)

Retrieves a list of **Streamkap Kafka topics** with optional filtering.

Use this data source to discover topics across your Streamkap cluster.

[Documentation](https://docs.streamkap.com/streamkap-provider-for-terraform)

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all topics
data "streamkap_topics" "all" {}

# List topics from sources only
data "streamkap_topics" "source_topics" {
  entity_type = "sources"
}

# List topics from specific entities
data "streamkap_topics" "filtered" {
  entity_type = "sources"
  entity_ids  = ["source-id-1", "source-id-2"]
}

# Output topic count
output "total_topics" {
  value = data.streamkap_topics.all.total
}

# Output topic names
output "topic_names" {
  value = [for t in data.streamkap_topics.all.topics : t.name]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `entity_ids` (List of String) Filter topics by specific entity IDs.
- `entity_type` (String) Filter topics by entity type. Valid values: `sources`, `transforms`, `destinations`.

### Read-Only

- `topics` (Attributes List) List of topics matching the filter criteria. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--topics))
- `total` (Number) Total number of topics matching the filter.

<a id="nestedatt--topics"></a>
### Nested Schema for `topics`

Read-Only:

- `entity_id` (String) ID of the entity (source/transform/destination) that owns this topic.
- `entity_name` (String) Name of the entity that owns this topic.
- `entity_type` (String) Type of entity: `sources`, `transforms`, or `destinations`.
- `id` (String) Unique topic identifier.
- `messages_30d` (Number) Number of messages in the last 30 days.
- `messages_7d` (Number) Number of messages in the last 7 days.
- `name` (String) Topic name.
- `prefix` (String) Topic name prefix.
- `serialization` (String) Message serialization format.
